card.name: Aminatou, Veil Piercer
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.) Each enchantment card in your hand has miracle. Its miracle cost is equal to its mana cost reduced by {4}. (You may cast a card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Archon of Cruelty
card.text: Flying Whenever Archon of Cruelty enters or attacks, target opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker, discards a card, and loses 3 life. You draw a card and gain 3 life.

card.name: Crypt Ghast
card.text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}.

card.name: Damn
card.text: Destroy target creature. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated. Overload {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

card.name: Exhume
card.text: Each player puts a creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield.

card.name: Goryo's Vengeance
card.text: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Splice onto Arcane {2}{B} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: I Will Savor Your Agony
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Destroy target creature. • Target player draws a card. • Target player gains 5 life.

card.name: Living Death
card.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Time Bends to My Will
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, take an extra turn after this one. Skip the untap step of that turn.

card.name: Valgavoth, Harrower of Souls
card.text: Flying Ward—Pay 2 life. Whenever an opponent loses life for the first time during each of their turns, put a +1/+1 counter on Valgavoth, Harrower of Souls and draw a card.

card.name: Winter, Cynical Opportunist
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Winter attacks, mill three cards. Delirium — At the beginning of your end step, you may exile any number of cards from your graveyard with four or more card types among them. If you do, put a permanent card from among them onto the battlefield with a finality counter on it.

card.name: Zimone, Mystery Unraveler
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, manifest dread if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn. Otherwise, you may turn a permanent you control face up. (To manifest dread, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature and the other into your graveyard. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
